findings.title: claimRewards() Function Should Only Be Executable in AWARDED State
findings.description: The claimRewards() function has incorrect logic and should only be executable when the contract is in the AWARDED state.

findings.title: Unlocked Pragma statements found in the contracts
findings.description: Pragma statements are not locked to a specific version, which can lead to unintended behavior or security vulnerabilities if the compiler version is changed.

findings.title: No Events emitted after imperative State Variable modification
findings.description: The contract does not emit events after modifying state variables imperatively, which can lead to unintended behavior.
